name: suffocate
description:
Crashed on a distant planet with your last tank of oxygen, explore the land and keep breathing. 

You can't change the fact that the oxygen will eventually run out, but maybe you can still find some closure.

[ Controls ]

hold ENTER to breathe in

release to breathe out

WASD to Move

E to Pick Up and Drop

SHIFT to sprint

[ Creators ]

Sam Feng - Programming, Sounds

Jose Salas - Art

Eizi Yu - Designs
